name: Any Fully Custom Pokémon
description:
Design your own custom Pokémon.

The stats you can choose include:
IV/EV spread, LVL, gender, shiny/non, tera type, nature, move set, ability, held item, ball, nickname, TID, SID, OT, & OT gender

name: Any Held Item
description:
Choose any tradable held item. Key items not available

10 items $9
20 items for $17

name: JP Ditto
description:
Japan Region
LVL 100
Shiny

Choose any nature + any held item

name: JP Ditto - ALL 25 Natures
description:
Japan Region, LVL 100, Shiny

One of each of the 25 Natures. Choose 25 items in multiples of 5; including Destiny Knots, Gold Bottle Caps, Ability Patches, Lucky Eggs, and Everstones

name: Custom Egg
description: Design your own custom egg. Including: IV spread, gender, shiny/non, tera type, nature, move set, ability, held item, ball, TID, SID, OT, & OT gender

name: Random Egg
description: A random egg from previous customer orders. No filler eggs are added to the random pool. Gamblers only!

name: Ancient Paradox + Koraidon Bundle
description:
All 6IV, LVL 52-72. Pick shiny or non-shiny. Add $6 for customization.

Includes: Great Tusk, Brute Bonnet, Sandy Shocks, Scream Tail, Flutter Mane, Slither Wing, Roaring Moon, Koraidon, 8 master balls

name: Future Paradox + Miraidon Bundle
description:
All 6IV, LVL 52-72. Pick shiny or non-shiny. Add $6 for customization.

Includes: Iron Treads, Iron Moth, Iron Hands, Iron Jugulis, Iron Thorns, Iron Bundle, Iron Valiant, Miraidon, 8 master balls

name: Any Standard Pokémon
description:
Useful for obtaining a Shiny Charm. Easily fill your Pokédex with all 400 Pokémom.

These Pokémon do not come with any customizable options.

name: All 3 Paldean Starters
description:
Includes: LVL 5 6IV Sprigatito, Fuecoco, & Quaxly with 3 master balls

Choose shiny or non-shiny

name: Secret ID Service
description:
Want to be the original trainer (OT) of all custom Pokémon that you order? This service will provide you with your SID. Simply trade any of your Pokémon and you will receive your SID. Your SID will be saved and used for all your future custom Pokémon orders

One time fee
